wikipedia_page.main: Gareth Jewell (born 7 June 1983) is a British television actor from Ammanford, Wales.

response: * Gareth Jewell as Rob Williams – (Series 1, Episode 1) Confident in his work Rob seeks to help his patients and his friends to the best of his ability. However, when dealing with a mentally ill patient (david lee smith) he is fatally stabbed.

link_mentions.page: List of Pobol y Cwm characters

response: New additions for the second series included Cardiff-based actor Paul Morgans of, who appeared as Dylan, while Carys Eleri was cast as Llio, Dylan's wife. Richard Harrington and Gareth Jewell were also cast in the leading roles of Simon and Phil respectively.

* Gareth Jewell portrays Phil (Series 2). Phil is the son of Bessie and the brother of Kevin and Shane, Having recently been released from prison, Phil served time for the murder of his girlfriend. Martin, the brother of his girlfriend is on Phil's back and will do what he can to make him pay. Phil becomes a love interest of Alys.

An open bisexual, Freya attends an interview at the Mill Health Centre and meets a fellow applicant, Kevin Tyler (Simon Rivers). The pair take an instant dislike to one another. Freya is mentored by Zara. Freya later starts a casual relationship with her friend Bobbie Greene (Gareth Jewell). Their romance soon becomes complicated when Freya decides that she would like more commitment. The pair later end their relationship.
* Aled Jenkins - Welsh teacher (played by Gareth Jewell) (series 3-9)
* Gareth Jewell as DI Carl Roberts (series 1)
